ManagerScene1: ^Hello. My name is Anna Nyugen. I’m the defense attorney representing Nadine Kanna.
^If you have time, I would like to ask you some questions.
^I’m very busy right now, can you not tell?
^This concerns the murder case of Madeline Bain.
^Well, yes! Everything concerns that right now. Did you not see the crowd of reporters when you came in?
^Do you know of anyone Madeline was in contact with shortly before her death?
^The manager looks down and thinks for a moment, then narrows her gaze on you.
Choice_Legal: ^If you keep spouting nonsense like that, I’ll ask that a lawyer be present the next time we speak.
Choice_Justice: ^To help me bring justice to Madeline.
^The last person she saw was probably her lover, Olaf Kanna.
^He came to see her at the Gala.
^This media doesn’t know about their relationship, so you must not say anything to the public. Otherwise, I will press charges against you.
^Let me write down his number for you.
^Thank you for your cooperation. I have a search warrant for Madeline's office. Could you please point me to where it is?
^We share a space since we work so closely together. You can follow me.
